languages.text: В этом крохотном предмете заключена искра беспримесной ярости, готовая в любой момент изгнать энергию из всех устройств на заставе блюстителей, обратив их в груду безжизненного металла.

traits.locale_text: В этом крохотном предмете заключена искра беспримесной ярости, готовая в любой момент изгнать Движущую силу из всех устройств на заставе блюстителей, обратив их в груду безжизненного металла.

languages.text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
languages.original_text: В этом крохотном предмете заключена искра беспримесной ярости, готовая в любой момент изгнать энергию из всех устройств на заставе блюстителей, обратив их в груду безжизненного металла.

traits.locale_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the Motive Force from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the Motive Force from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.

languages.text: 这个微小的物件包含着纯粹的怒火，随时准备将执法者哨站中所有设备的电力彻底清除，将它们变成一堆毫无生机的金属。
languages.original_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.

traits.locale_text: 这个微小的物件包含着纯粹的怒火，随时准备将执法者哨站中所有设备的源力彻底清除，将它们变成一堆毫无生机的金属。

languages.text: Este objeto diminuto contiene una chispa de furia visceral que podría desatarse en cualquier momento, purgando la energía de todos los dispositivos que hay en el puesto de guardia y reduciéndolos a un montón de chatarra metálica desprovista de vida.
languages.original_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.

traits.locale_text: Este objeto diminuto contiene una chispa de furia visceral que podría desatarse en cualquier momento, purgando la Fuerza Motriz de todos los dispositivos que hay en el puesto de guardia y reduciéndolos a un montón de chatarra metálica desprovista de vida.

languages.text: この小さな物体には純粋な怒りの火花が散りばめられており、いつでもエンフォーサーの持ち場にあるすべての装置から力を放出し、生気のない金属の山にすることができる。
languages.original_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.

traits.locale_text: この小さな物体には純粋な怒りの火花が散りばめられており、いつでもエンフォーサーの持ち場にあるすべての装置から原動力を追い出し、生気のない金属の山にすることができる。

languages.text: Dieses winzige Objekt enthält einen Funken ungefilterte Wut, die allen Geräten in der Station der Enforcer jederzeit die Energie rauben und sie in lebloses Metall verwandeln kann.
languages.original_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.

traits.locale_text: Dieses winzige Objekt enthält einen Funken ungefilterte Wut, die allen Geräten in der Station der Enforcer jederzeit die Antriebskraft rauben und sie in lebloses Metall verwandeln kann.

languages.text: Ce minuscule objet abrite en son sein une étincelle de rage pure, prête à expulser à tout instant l'énergie qui alimente les appareils du poste des prévôts pour les réduire à un tas de ferraille inerte.
languages.original_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.

traits.locale_text: Ce minuscule objet abrite en son sein une étincelle de rage pure, prête à expulser à tout instant la Force Motrice qui alimente les appareils du poste des prévôts pour les réduire à un tas de ferraille inerte.

languages.text: Bu minik nesne, katıksız bir öfke kıvılcımı içeriyor. İstendiği anda infazcı noktasındaki tüm cihazların gücünü devre dışı bırakarak onları işlevsiz bir metal yığınına dönüştürmeye hazır.
languages.original_text: This tiny object contains a spark of unadulterated rage, primed at any moment to expel the power from all devices in the enforcers' post, reducing them to a pile of lifeless metal.
